item.title: HackTheBox - Lame Writeup
item.description: Enumeration First, let’s do an enumeration with the IP address of this machine. I’m gonna run Nmap [Netwok Mapper] to scan any open ports. I’m gonna run this command nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap/initial 10.10.10.3 Explaining the nmap scan: -sC := scan using nmap default script -sV := scan for version -oN := output in normal format The Nmap scan shows us port 21 is FTP and can log in as anonymous.
